Himachal Pradesh.title: Himachal Pradesh
Himachal Pradesh.byline: Himachal Pradesh (Punjabi: ਹਿਮਾਚਲ ਪ੍ਰਦੇਸ਼) is a state in north India, and offers much for those looking to experience the Himalayas.

Himeji.title: Himeji
Himeji.byline: Himeji (姫路) is a city at the western edge of the Kansai region of Japan.

Himarë.title: Himarë
Himarë.byline: Himara is a city on the coast of Albania in the Albanian Riviera.
